title: Landing More Customers: A PWV Founder Event
description: Join the Preston-Werner Ventures Founder Community for an In-Person Event Focused on GTM, Marketing, and Customer Acquisition Strategies to Land More Customers. Hosted by Jennifer Tacheff, David Price & David Thyresson. Why Attend? Get Insights You Can Use: Proven GTM and customer acquisition strategies from founders and leaders who've been there. Tackle Real Challenges: Case studies from PWV portfolio companies showcasing actionable solutions. Build Your Network: Meet potential collaborators, clients, and partners over drinks and bites. Featured speakers include: Tom Preston-Werner, Co-founder of GitHub, GP at PWV; Gorkem Yurtseven, Co-founder of Fal.ai â€“ Generative media platform for developers; Cory O'Daniel, CEO & Co-Founder of Massdriver â€“ DevOps Without the Red Tape; Simon Box, CEO of ReSim.ai, Plug-and-Play Testing for Robotics and AI; And More!
